titles.title: One day when heaven was filled

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: One day when heaven was filled with His praises, One day when sin was as black as could be, Jesus came forth to be born of a virgin— Dwelt among men, my example is He!
